type="showPopup"><popup title="New Popup" width="90%"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-1KdL-583" allowhtml="true"><contents><b>Please use a rough guide for rating payouts.</b><br>
<br><em><strong>This is for internal use only.</em></strong><br>
<br><b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b><br>
1. Basic errors on documents, 3 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 2-3 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 2-3 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items but communication could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, deposit paid and al documents/ invoices correct.<br>


<br><b>Sale & HP Back / Vendor sale</b><br>

1. Basic errors on documents, 5 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 3-4 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 3-4 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, and all documents/ invoices correct and conditions met.<br></contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></button><button type="multi" uniqueid="sk-3vUV-514" label="Not a Broker"><actions><action type="branch" whenfinished="stop"><formula>({{genesis_Proposed_Funder__c}} == 'SAF')</formula><iftrueactions><action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Application" affectedrows="context"><updates><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="genesis__Status__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="UNDERWRITING"/><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Not_a_Broker__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/></updates></action><action type="save"><models><model>Application</model></models></action><action type="closeTopmostPopup"/><action type="custom" snippet="refresh"/></iftrueactions></action><action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Application" affectedrows="context"><updates><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="genesis__Status__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="UNDERWRITING - MULTIPLE"/><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Not_a_Broker__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/></updates></action><action type="save"><models><model>Application</model></models></action><action type="closeAllPopups"/><action type="custom" snippet="refresh"/></actions><renderconditions logictype="and"/><enableconditions logictype="and" message="Please enter a Broker Grade"/></button><button type="multi" uniqueid="sk-HbG-527" label="Save"><actions><action type="branch" whenfinished="stop"><formula>({{genesis_Proposed_Funder__c}} == 'SAF')</formula><iftrueactions><action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Application" affectedrows="context"><updates><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="genesis__Status__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="UNDERWRITING"/></updates></action><action type="save"><models><model>Application</model></models></action><action type="closeTopmostPopup"/><action type="custom" snippet="refresh"/></iftrueactions></action><action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Application" affectedrows="context"><updates><update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="genesis__Status__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="UNDERWRITING - MULTIPLE"/></updates></action><action type="save"><models><model>Application</model></models></action><action type="closeAllPopups"/><action type="custom" snippet="refresh"/></actions><renderconditions logictype="and"/><enableconditions logictype="and" message="Please enter a Broker Grade"><condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="Application" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="Broker_Grade__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Applications__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/></enableconditions></button></buttons></buttonset></components>
